column4: I am using Ubuntu 6.06 AMD 64, and I tries to enable Large Page Support, but the option doesnt seem to be there - cat /proc/meminfo | grep Huge - returns nothing? is Large Page Support disabled?
is large page support a 64bit attribute?
im not sure, its certainly available on 32bit SuSE, its something that was added to the 2.6 kernel - http://blogs.sun.com/roller/page/dagastine?entry=java_se_tuning_tip_large
